<<<<<<< HEAD
An English prosodia to be learned immediately after the Accidence, in order to the better learning of Propria quæ maribus, as in præsenti, and quæ genus. By J. T. A.B. Thomas, James, b. 1657 or 8.
[12], 18, [2] p.
printed for the author, and are to be had at Robert Whites in Trinity Court near Aldersgate, London : 1685.
The dedication is signed: James Thomas. Caption title on p. 1 reads: Prosodia. The final leaf contains a postscript. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

printed for the author, and are to be had at Robert Whites in Trinity Court near Aldersgate, London : 1685.
The dedication is signed: James Thomas. Caption title on p. 1 reads: Prosodia. The final leaf contains a postscript. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
